Body:
expression = re.compile(rfc._WEEKDAY_REGEX)
weekdays = ['Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday',
    'Saturday', 'Sunday']
for weekday in weekdays:
    self.assertTrue(bool(expression.fullmatch(weekday)), msg=
        "Weekday '{w}' was not included in regex.".format(w=weekday))
